means: 在…中失败( fail的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
sentence.Network_cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

sentence.Network_en: He criticised the government for failing to halt economic decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 他批评政府未能遏止经济下滑。

sentence.Network_en: People accused the ministry of failing to take adequate preventive measures.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们谴责该政府部门未能采取足够的预防措施。

entry.def: The failings of someone or something are their faults or unsatisfactory features.

example.ex: Like many in Russia, she blamed the country's failings on futile attempts to catch up with the West...
example.tran: 像俄罗斯很多人一样，她认为国家的错误就在于徒然地竭力追赶西方。

example.ex: He had invented an imaginary son, in order to make up for his real son's failings.
example.tran: 为了弥补现实中儿子的不足之处，他就想象出了一个儿子。

entry.tran: (引出另一种选择)如果不能的话，万一不行的话
entry.def: You say failing that to introduce an alternative, in case what you have just said is not possible.

example.ex: Find someone who will let you talk things through, or failing that, write down your thoughts.
example.tran: 找个能让你把事情说清楚的人，如果不行的话，就把你所想的写下来。

sentences.sentence: "he was quick to point out his wife's failings"

fail犯错误,欺骗+ing……的→adj.失败的

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的

Sentence.sentence: It is harder to predict how Mr Obama's proposed reforms to the failing health-care system will turn out.

The way in which Mr Jobs revived the failing company he had co-founded and turned it into the world's biggest tech firm (bigger even than Bill Gates's Microsoft, the company that had outsmarted Apple so dramatically in the 1980s), sounds like something from a Hollywood movie.
He turned a failing company into a profitable business

Scholars will debate which interventions this time - the Federal Reserve's support of a failing credit system, guarantees of bank debt, Obama's ''stimulus" plan and bank "stress test" - counted most in preventing a recurrence.
In writing about their own experiences many applicants slip into clichés, thus failing to engage the reader.
Setting realistic goals can turn a failing business into success.

sentences.en: We all have our little failings.

sentences.cn: 要是史密斯不在, 就找汤姆。
